name: Code Carbon
summary:
Take control of your very own planet! Balance energy with emissions in the face of a growing population and worsening climate change in this nerve-wracking simulation strategy game.

The swelling population is hungry for power and only you can supply what it needs to survive. Expand your infrastructure and invest in fossil fuels and renewable energy economically, politically, and environmentally. Increase your power production and multiply your global funds all the while limiting carbon emissions in order to develop a sustainable economy. Understand the mechanics of Climate Change better by playing our strategy game!
